description: While trying to save Ringo, Shoma has been involved in a traffic accident. While that unfolds, Himari is back home peacefully resting - dreaming about the day that she and her brothers went out to the aquarium. In her dream, she seems to be chasing a strange penguin that nobody else can seem to see. While chasing the penguin she eventually finds herself in an elevator which takes her down to a big white library, surrounded by a grove of trees.
